Compose:
 1. Start by selecting a root chord
 " (Ab, A, Bb, B, C, C#, D, Eb, E, F, F#, or G)."
 2. One or more fingering chart images
 " for the chord will be displayed."
 3. Optionally, select a chord variation
 " (5, 6, 7, 9, min, min7, or sus)."
 4. To hear a chord, tap its fingering chart
 " image."
 5. Drag a fingering chart image to the
 " Chord Progression area."
 6. Fill the Progression area with different
 " chords until you have a complete song."
 " - Empty spots (rest signs) in the"
 " Chord Progression are ignored."
 " - Surround several chords with begin"
 " and end "repeats" as necessary."
 7. Switch to the Play page to play your
 " new song."
 8. Select Save on the Compose page to
 " save your new song."

Play:
 1. Tap the guitar image to play a chord.
 2. Tap the chord fingering chart image to
 " change chords."
Library:\n Open a previously saved song or\n Delete a previously saved song.
